data.title: One night stay in Scottsdale
data.text: While vacationing for two weeks on west of US our tour guides suggested this restaurant. All our group of 16 went for dinner and a few drinks, everyone loved the food. I had to st louis ribs and they were fantastic, would recommend half portion which was more than enough for me. The waitors could not have done more for our group and were super friendly. The interior was kind of rustic with a really chilled out vibe. Dress code would be casual. Delighted we ate here on our 1 night stay in Scottsdale.

data.title: Awesome Dive-Bar with an amazing atmosphere
data.text:
The perfect places to enjoy a few cool-ones with your buddies or colleagues. Not only is this an exceptionally charming bar, they have really-really good beers, ales & stouts. I had IPA I can't remember the name but that's always a good sign.

Remember to bring some dollar bills with you, as you can stick them on the wall with a message. There's games such as Ping-Pong, Pool, Darts & some others. 

The bartenders & staff are super friendly and quick to service. Highly recommended for anyone who enjoys a nice beer.

data.title: Local dive
data.text: This bar was recommended by a waiter, so we popped in there after our meal not sure what to expect. We got a basic cocktail,bourbon and soda, and shot a round of pool then left as we were under the impression that they had live music.

data.title: A popular local bar that serves drinks only
data.text: Patties is long time local bar that serves drinks only with no food offerings. The patrons are mostly locals but on weekends during the school year is a popular venue for area college kids. Pool and ping pong are available in the spacious courtyard adjacent to the bar area
